name: Complex Solution
flavor_text: A quantum algorithm, like a sword stroke, must be repeated until the solution is certain.

frame.name: Adaptive Frame
frame.description:
[Heavy Attack]  : Launch a heavy uppercut attack.
Heavy attacks are stronger with full energy.

perks.description: Sword Guard has maximized efficiency and high endurance, but low resistance.
perks.name: Enduring Guard

perks.description: Sword ammo granted for every other powered sword kill.
perks.name: Tireless Blade
